00044     class _OgreExport ParticleSystemRenderer : public StringInterface, public FXAlloc
00045     {
00046     public:
00048         ParticleSystemRenderer() {}
00050         virtual ~ParticleSystemRenderer() {}
00051 
00053         virtual const String& getType(void) const = 0;
00054 
00060         virtual void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue, 
00061             std::list<Particle*>& currentParticles, bool cullIndividually) = 0;
00062 
00064         virtual void _setMaterial(MaterialPtr& mat) = 0;
00066         virtual void _notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam) = 0;
00068         virtual void _notifyAttached(Node* parent, bool isTagPoint = false) = 0;
00070         virtual void _notifyParticleRotated(void) {}
00072         virtual void _notifyParticleResized(void) {}
00074         virtual void _notifyParticleQuota(size_t quota) = 0;
00076         virtual void _notifyDefaultDimensions(Real width, Real height) = 0;
00078         virtual void _notifyParticleEmitted(Particle* particle) {}
00080         virtual void _notifyParticleExpired(Particle* particle) {}
00082         virtual void _notifyParticleMoved(std::list<Particle*>& currentParticles) {}
00084         virtual void _notifyParticleCleared(std::list<Particle*>& currentParticles) {}
00092         virtual ParticleVisualData* _createVisualData(void) { return 0; }
00100         virtual void _destroyVisualData(ParticleVisualData* vis) { assert (vis == 0); }
00101 
00105         virtual void setRenderQueueGroup(uint8 queueID) = 0;
00106 
00109         virtual void setKeepParticlesInLocalSpace(bool keepLocal) = 0;
00110 
00112         virtual SortMode _getSortMode(void) const = 0;
00113 
00118         virtual void visitRenderables(Renderable::Visitor* visitor, 
00119             bool debugRenderables = false) = 0;
00120 
00121     };
